pkgmetadata.longdescription: Download Spatial Datasets of Peru // Provides convenient access to the official spatial datasets of Peru as 'sf' objects in R. This package includes a wide range of geospatial data covering various aspects of Peruvian geography, such as: administrative divisions (Source: INEI https://ide.inei.gob.pe/), protected natural areas (Source: GEO ANP - SERNANP https://geo.sernanp.gob.pe/visorsernanp/). All datasets are harmonized in terms of attributes, projection, and topology, ensuring consistency and ease of use for spatial analysis and visualization.
